price: Nokorε sε nsεnkyerεnee wͻ ͻsoro ne asaase so de ma agyidiefoͻ no.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi laāyātin lil'mu'minīna
